name: RECONDITE (Re_Lo)
description:
A game made in 72 hours for the Ludum dare 48. My first Ludum dare btw.

A game about getting deeper into a cave to save your Child.

A simple horror precission platformer in wich you cannot fall... and you can only go down.

Also with the hurry forgot to mention that at one point your light will fail and you have to recharge pressing R repeatedly. I will fix the tutorial once LD ratings finish
